result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jennifer C Sagen

records.descr: Motion and order for withdrawal of counsel

records.addlTxt:
9:33 AM Defendant Jennifer C Sagen appeared by phone.  Attorney Richard Louis Yonko in court for Jennifer C Sagen.  Attorney Scott H dirks appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. New PD will need to be appointed.  DE does not appear in person so counsel was not able to complete paperwork. DE is to contact the PD office for new counsel.  Adj 9:46AM.
Review hearing scheduled for November 28, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Review hearing on November 28, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Plea/sentencing hearing on October 5, 2022 at 09:00 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Jennifer C Sagen
Current: 14304 Empire Avenue, Apple Valley, MN 55124 United States  (Effective: 09-26-2022)
Prior: W8630 Hwy 8, Ladysmith, WI 54848

1:16 PM Defendant Jennifer C Sagen appeared by video.  Attorney Scott H dirks appeared by video for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Richard Louis Yonko appeared by video for Jennifer C Sagen. Heard along with 22CF44, 22TR42.  Per SP Dirks case had been set for a PH, DE/Atty will waive PH.  Court instructs on waiver of PH, DE makes waiver knowingly, freely and voluntarily, court will accept the waiver of PH.  Court finds PC, will bind over for Trial.  Will proceed to Arraignment.  Waive reading of the Information, enter a plea of NG. SP Dirks has presented an offer to Atty Yonko. Atty Yonko believes this matter has resolved, asks for a P/S date. Set for P/S October 5, 2022 @ 10:00am. Bond continues.  Adj 1:24pm.
Review hearing on August 18, 2022 at 01:15 pm.

9:59 AM Defendant Jennifer C Sagen not in court.  Attorney scott H dirks appeared by video for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Richard Louis Yonko appeared by video for Jennifer C Sagen. Per SP Dirks DE failed to appear timely for the last court appearance, asks the court for a warrant. Atty Yonko requests no warrant be issued.  SP Dirks argues for the warrant.  Set for August 18, 2022 @ 1:15, RH. Adj 10:06am.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: 10:38 AM Defendant Jennifer C Sagen not in court.  Attorney scott H dirks appeared by video for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Richard Louis Yonko appeared by video for Jennifer C Sagen.   All cases 22CF44 and 22TR42 heard at the same time.       Matter set for PH.    Attorney Yonko spoke with her yesterday and planned to be here.  Court found nonappearance was without lawful justification.    Court issued BW, $1000 cash, enter NW.    DE appeared in Court at 10:48AM.  Matter recalled.    Court quashed warrant.  JA to reschedule PH.   Adj. 10:49 AM.
Preliminary hearing on June 22, 2022 at 10:30 am.

9:06 AM Defendant Jennifer C Sagen appeared by video.  Attorney scott H dirks appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. Heard along with 22CF44, 22TR42.  Atty Richard Yonko appears in person.  Atty Yonko states he has not been appointed to this case. DE has not made application to the PD office as of yet. The court will find good cause to extend the PH in this case. DE must contact the PD office for representation, ordered by the court to do so.  SP Dirks asks the court that expenses for witness fees be ordered against DE as this hearing was set many months ago. Set for PH June 22, 2022 @ 10:30AM. Court will hold request for witness fees open until the 22nd hearing. Adj 9:11pm. Officer Schmidts subpoena will continue until the next hearing.

0:00 AM Defendant Jennifer C Sagen in court with attorney Richard Louis Yonko.  Scott H Dirks appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Heard along with 21CF154, 22CF44.  Atty Yonko has not been appointed in 22CF44 as of yet. 

 22CF44-Waive reading of the CC.  Set for PH May 10, 2022 @ 9:00.  Court instructs on waiver of TL for PH, DE understands waiver of TL, court will accept waiver of TL.  

21CF154-State moves to dismiss case, no objection from DE.  Court will grant dismissal of case. Adj 10:06am.
Preliminary hearing on May 10, 2022 at 09:00 am.

No possession/consumption or use of illegal or illicit drugs, or any substance intended to use to alter mental state or mood.  Not to possess any drug paraphernalia.  No possession of medications not prescribed to you by a physician.
